title: What does Brazil’s election mean for the United States?
description: From the fate of the Amazon rain forest to trade, the choosing of a new Brazilian leader comes at a key moment for the country’s relations with the United States.
dc:creator: Ana Ionova
media:description: President Donald J. Trump with President Jair Bolsonaro of Brazil in 2019. The two leaders struck a fast alliance, bonding over a common disdain of the global climate agenda and “communist threats” like Venezuela.
